body.name: Nicehill Nightstand, Dresser with 3 Drawers, Bedside Table Chest of Drawers, Small Dresser for Bedroom, Kids' Room, Closet, Kids Dresser with Wooden Top Steel Frame, Modern, Black Wood Grain
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 42 mins
features: Nightstand with 3 Drawers: Nicehill black night stand with drawers is a stylish storage solution for bedroom, kids' room, college dorm, living room, nursery, closet, home office and more. This 3 drawers dresser can be a night stand for bedrooms, an end table by sofa, a toy organizer in kid's room, or placed inside the closet to create extra storage.

Sufficient Storage Space: Three black drawers of the nightstand can provide enough storage space to store nighttime necessities. Lamp, alarm clock, vase or other small decors can be placed on wooden top.

Sturdy & Stable: Thickened water-resistant wood board and reinforced metal frame make this black bedside table stronger. Adjustable feet can adapt to uneven ground, will make it more stable. Anti-tip kits is included, don't worry about naughty boys or girls.

Stylish & Humanized Design: Simple and modern style with elegant look complements to any decor. You can also find more dressers in the same style at Nicehill. Lightweight design makes the end table easily move to any room, and easy pull handles can make opening and closing smooth.

Easy to Assemble and Clean: This nightstand for bedroom can be assembled in 15 minutes. The overall dimensions of the dresser for kids' room: 11.81"L x 15.74"W x 28.54"H. Nicehill small bedside table for bedroom will be a great housewarming gift or Christmas gift for your family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these! I wanted something a bit smaller and these were the perfect size. They are quite sturdy, they look great, and they were very easy to set up. A great find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these nightstands!! They look classy cuz they’re simple and they're easy to put together in no time.I absolutely love the drawer space, I have small containers to hold things. It’s also very sturdy, when I open and close the drawers, all my items stay put.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is pretty cute, so far the only problem I've had is the frame was missing a bolt anchor but it was something my family had extra of so I just fixed it instead of contacting the company. Other than that it was easy to put together and I love it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TEEN PROOF !EASY TO ASSEMBLE!, SPACE SAVER PROOF !, HOLDS ALOTTT!, STURDY AND BEST OF AFFORDABLE
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. TEEN PROOF !EASY TO ASSEMBLE!, SPACE SAVER PROOF !, HOLDS ALOTTT!, STURDY AND BEST OF AFFORDABLEHighly Highly! Recommend getting this dresser. I was very skeptical and spend days trying to decide whether to get it and if is worth it.1st it was for my soon to be 13 year old son who has destroyed every type of dresser We have bought. we have bought the all grades of wood and we just gave up!. So if you are looking for a dresser for a teen room this is a must the draws are deep and hold a lot of clothing. Plus it thin so it doesn’t take a lot of width space and the length is reasonable. We also bought the computer and night stand which is also amazing! It has deep pockets as well and hold alottt. .The Funiture at a whole is perfect for small rooms and teen proof because not only is affordable it doesn’t take much space , gives the full furniture room look and Al of the products body is Metal the draws are cubicle which ha that depth that you need. This product made me question if all my Ashley Funiture was ever worth the money because it gives me all the usage I actually need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Cabinet - Needs Washers on Screws for Handles
reviews.reviewText: The cabinet is good, and seems well made for a cloth type drawer cabinet. The one recommendation I have is to put washers on the screws holding the handles to the drawers. I would recommend this even if the drawers were made of wood, but in particular when the drawer is a cloth/cardboard material. Over time, without the washers there would be a high probability the screws alone would pull through the material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty easy to set up and very stable
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this nightstand is very capable of lots of things and most nightstands can range from 100 - 500 dollars and although this one is made of cheap material, it gets the job done and looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. Fits a lot of clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars An attractive addition to my bathroom.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small cabinet with drawers to keep light weight things handy in the bathroom. This cabinet fit the bill. It's very attractive, and a good deal for the money. It was a bit of a challenge to assemble -- the little screws were not easy to handle for someone with arthritis. But i persevered, and was very pleased with the results. The drawers are cloth covered cardboard, so I would not want to store anything heavy in them, but its great for tissues, t-paper, soap, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loads of storage, great looking furniture. Really easy to assemble. Great price too. This was the 4th purchase of this range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very good does a great job.
